text: Joseph Pilato (March 16, 1949 – March 24, 2019) was an American actor. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He was best known for his roles as Captain Rhodes in the 1985 movie Day of the Dead and as the Dean Martin lookalike in Pulp Fiction (1994). Pilato died in his sleep on March 24, 2019, eight days after his 70th birthday.R.I.P. ‘Day of the Dead’ Scene-Stealer Joseph Pilato Has Died at 70 Bloody Disgusting, March 25, 2019 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Joseph Pilato
